greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of order-preserving or order-reversing full contraction mappings (of an n-chain) with height exactly k.
reference: A. D. Adeshola, V. Maltcev and A. Umar, Combinatorial results for certain semigroups of order-preserving full contraction mappings of a finite chain, (submitted).
example: T (3,2) = 8 because there are exactly 8 order-preserving full contraction mappings (of a 3-chain) with exactly height 2, namely: (112), (122), (211), (221), (223), (233), (322), (332).
results.author: _Abdullahi Umar_, Feb 28 2013
